summary: This mod adds a simple standalone follower in Dragonsreach.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90549/90549-1522890149-2050360182.png[/img]

This mod adds a new member to Jarl Balgruuf's guard, a standalone follower named Luna. She can be found in Dragonsreach. In addition to being a competent archer, Luna is also a trainer npc, who can, for a few septims, raise your archery level up to 90.

This is my first attempt at a standalone follower, and after a number of setbacks I think she will finally work. If there are any issues with the follower, please let me know. I will do my best to address issues that may arise, but my experience as a modder is little to none, so there may not be much that I can do.

If enough people are interested, I can add one or two more versions with different hairstyles.

If you're a modder and you have any ideas about how I could improve or how I can lower my file sizes in the future, please let me know! I would love advice about how to improve.

Let me know what you think!
